pages.text: You could probably punch through concrete with this. And with its insane durability, you could do that for quite a while.$(br2)With its high chance to inflict Bleeding, you can rack up a lot of extra damage.

pages.title: Smithing
pages.text: This item is crafted using the $(l)smithing table$().$(br)You need a $(l:gauntlets/diamond)diamond gauntlet$(), and a netherite ingot.$(br2)$(o)Has a 85% chance to inflict $(#FF5555)Bleeding$().
